document_data.name: Hall of Everlasting Justice
document_data.mainbody: The '''Hall of Everlasting Justice''' was a stronghold of a temple dedicated to the deities [[Tyr]] and [[Torm]] within the city of [[Sundabar]], during the 14{{th}} century [[DR]]. It was located in the center of town, facing into ''the Circle'', opposite the [[Master's Hall]].
document_data.Services: [[Cleric]]s of the hall served within the [[Shieldsar]], the army of Sundabar, as both combat medics and [[divine]] casters of battle-[[magic]].
document_data.History: Sometime shortly before [[Eleasis]] [[1372 DR]], the temple's lead clergyman, [[Defender of Justice]] [[Triandial Truthammer]] disappeared while out on adventure. He was succeeded by "Lady Stone", [[Lathkiera Morlund]].
